Name: DEPRECATED: Weaknesses without Software Fault Patterns
Objective: This view has been deprecated. It was based on gaps in another view (CWE-888) related to research that is no longer updated, but was complete with respect to CWE at the time it was conducted.

MappingNotes.Rationale: This CWE has been deprecated. It is also a View.

Content_History.ModificationComment: updated Description, Name, Type, View_Audience, View_Filter

Content_History.ContributionComment: suggested that there were errors in this view (leading to changes in taxonomy mappings in some entries), and that this view was outdated, leading to the decision to deprecate
